reviewText: Fantastic! In case you wonder, this is kind of a 'greatest hits' of takeshi. This set features all your favourite games, played by parents teamed with their kids, an all female group, an international group with players from around the world, and even an episode where the general finally takes control of the castle, and takeshi and his soldiers must pass the games in order to restore power and take it back! Lots of laughs and joy
